title: A Climate Podcast Show by SDG Studio
description: A 20-episode podcast series featuring key figures working in the environmental space in Nepal.

title: Climate Dialogue Series on Public TV
description: Bringing local perspectives to the forefront of climate change discussions.

title: Manjit Dhakal (Climate Change Expert) on Good Morning Nepal
description: A conversational overview of climate change in Nepal.

title: Dr. Arnico Panday | This Morning LIVE In Conversation on Galaxy 4k
description: An atmospheric scientist turned politician shares his journey into politics, Nepal’s stance on climate change, and climate diplomacy.

title: Dr. Vishnu Prasad Pandey | Climate Change and Global Warming on Sushant Pradhan Podcast
description: An engineering professor at Tribhuvan University discusses climate change and its impacts.

title: Voices from Everest: Women and Community on Climate Change (2024)
description: Residents of the Everest region highlight climate challenges and local solutions.

title: No Monastery, No Village | Voices from the Roof of the World (2024)
description: A community's struggle to protect a cultural treasure from the imminent threat of glacial lake floods.

title: Wings of the Himalayas | Voices from the Roof of the World (2024)
description: Two biologists explore the survival of the threatened bearded vulture and the livelihoods of local mountain communities.

title: Unseen: Climate change and fragility in Nepal (2024)
description: Fishers and farmers share their struggles to eke out a living amidst environmental destruction and societal injustice.

title: Climate change and Nepal's dying village in the mountains (2023)
description: A look at the devastating impacts of unpredictable water supplies on the village of Samdzong.

title: A Melting Roof: Climatic Change in Nepal's Solukhumbu District (2024)
description: Explores the effects of climate change in Nepal's Solukhumbu district, which is home to numerous glaciers and lakes.

title: Untold stories of climate change loss and damage in the LDCs: Nepal (2023)
description: Climate justice campaigner from Nepal narrates how her family and community are experiencing the reality of loss and damage from climate change.

title: A Documentary on Climate Change and Governance in Nepal | AP1HD (2022)
description: An in-depth exploration of the profound impacts of the climate crisis on Nepal.

title: Climate Change in Himalayas (2022)
description: A brief look at climate change impacts in a remote Himalayan community.

title: Nationally Determined Contributions (NDC) Implementation Plan-2023
description: Outlines specific actions and timelines for implementing Nepal's commitments focusing on mitigation, adaptation, and resilience-building measures (in Nepali).

title: National Framework on Climate Change Induced Loss and Damage (L&D) 2021
description: Establishes a framework for addressing climate change-induced loss and damage in Nepal, including mechanisms for assessment, compensation, and resilience-building measures in vulnerable communities.

title: National Adaptation Plan 2021
description: A long-term adaptation plan to enhance Nepal's adaptive capacity and resilience to climate change from 2021-2050.

title: Nepal's Long-term Strategy for Net-zero Emissions 2021
description: Nepal’s plan to reach net-zero greenhouse gas emissions by 2045 through a range of mitigation and adaptation measures across key sectors.

title: Nepal’s Second Nationally Determined Contributions (NDCs) 2020
description: Targets for achieving net-zero greenhouse gas emissions by 2050 and promoting renewable energy and climate resilience.

title: Third National Communication (TNC) to the UNFCCC 2020
description: Detailed report on Nepal’s greenhouse gas inventory, climate change impacts, and mitigation and adaptation actions.

title: National Climate Change Policy 2019
description: Updated version of the 2011 policy, emphasizing enhanced adaptation and mitigation measures, and aligning with the Paris Agreement.

title: Climate Change Financing Framework 2017
description: Strategic framework designed to integrate climate change and climate finance into national planning and budgeting processes.

title: Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Act 2017
description: Established frameworks for comprehensive disaster risk reduction and management.

title: Nepal Sustainable Development Goals: Status and Roadmap 2016-2030
description: A comprehensive framework guiding Nepal's efforts towards achieving its Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) by 2030.

title: Nepal’s First Nationally Determined Contributions (NDCs) 2016
description: Submitted to the UNFCCC, outlining Nepal's commitments to climate action under the Paris Agreement.

title: Second National Communication (INC) to the UNFCCC 2014
description: Nepal's SNC was submitted in 2014, building on the Initial National Communication (2004) and further elaborating on climate change impacts, adaptation and mitigation efforts in the country.

title: Local Adaptation Plans of Action (LAPA) Framework 2011
description: Decentralized the implementation of climate adaptation strategies to local levels.

title: Climate Change Policy 2011
description: Focused on climate adaptation and mitigation, ensuring low-carbon development, and enhancing climate resilience.

title: National Adaptation Programme of Action (NAPA) 2010
description: Identified urgent and immediate adaptation needs of vulnerable communities.

title: Initial National Communication (INC) to the UNFCCC 2004
description: Nepal submitted its INC to the UNFCCC in July 2004, which provided an overview of national circumstances, greenhouse gas inventory, mitigation options, vulnerability assessment, and adaptation measures.

title: Climate Change Knowledge Portal - Nepal
description: High-level information on Nepal's climate zones, seasonal cycles, and climate change impacts.

title: Snapshot: Nepal Climate Change Action Plan 2021-2025
description: Outlines Nepal's climate change strategy and actions, aligning with the World Bank's Green, Resilient, and Inclusive Development (GRID) approach.

title: Nepal Country Climate and Development Report (2022)
description: Examines the country's development progress and climate change challenges.

title: Nepal Climate Risk Country Profile (2021)
description: An assessment of Nepal's climate risks, including extreme weather events, water scarcity, and land degradation.

title: Policy Brief: Climate Change Financing and Planning in Nepal (2021)
description: Key strategies and areas for integrating climate finance into national planning and budgeting processes.

title: ICIMOD - Regional Database System
description: A central data repository for the  Hindu Kush Himalayan region from the International Centre for Integrated Mountain Development.

title: Nepal Climate Summary 2023 (Department of Hydrology and Meteorology, Nepal)
description: An overview of the country's climate trends and impacts.

title: Climate Data Portal-Nepal (Department of Hydrology and Meteorology, Nepal)
description: Comprehensive data of river hydrology, water quality, sediment, limnology, snow hydrology, glaciology, weather, climate, agro-meteorology, air quality and solar energy.

title: Mountain GeoPortal (ICIMOD)
description: Gateway to geo-information resources of the Hindu Kush Himalayan (HKH) region.

title: National Spatial Data Center: Geoportal (Survey Department, Nepal)
description: A digital platform providing easy access to national geospatial datasets.

title: Climate Change Related Indicators of Nepal 2022 (Government of Nepal)
description: A comprehensive set of climate change statistics and indicators for Nepal.
